patthana19.8:1.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:1.1_1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo
patthana19.8:1.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo
patthana19.8:1.1_3: ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.8:2.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:2.1_1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo
patthana19.8:2.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo
patthana19.8:2.1_3: ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.8:3.1_0: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya
patthana19.8:3.1_1: pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana19.8:3.1_2: paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.8:4.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
